text: Hey everybody, we're here in Toronto, Ontario at the EdgeWalk
It's the highest circular walk in the entire world. And I'm taking my dad up on our first adventure on ThePlanetD.
Are you Excited dad?
Yeah, Really Excited.
Ask my mom though, how's she doing?
Laughs....petrified!
Are we chickening out today anyone?
We are not chickening out today. No we're not! We will not be adding a tick to the chicken mark.
Jim's out. My anchorman Dave!
Yeah, you made it out the door!
Well welcome to the edgewalk everybody!
I love seeing the shadow of the CN Tower work it's way out through the city throughout the day eh?
If you could put some numbers on the buildings, it would be the world's tallest sundial eh?
Alright Dave!
That's it Dave, yeah lean all the way in there buddy! Nice
Deb Your turn.
Look at her go right into that. This lady is fearless nice!
Throwing in some jazz hands
Alright Jim, your turn. Tall guys get the best lean.
Look at that!
Woah!Nice Job.
You know what, I think we should all do this together as a group. Everybody come to that second line,
Give me your best superman impression
There you go Dave, straighten those legs, shoulders back. Oh yeah!
That is a perfect lean back.
Alright Dave, you look so awesome, I'm going to have you hang out there until the rest of these guys get there.
Alright Jim, now is your chance, sit on down.  OKay, awesome!
Alright Deb, your turn. Keep your feet in front of you and walk it on back.
Oh yeah, make that look easy. Careful, there you go.
You can check out Skypod above us up there. Oh yeah. There's a whole bunch of people up there
See if they'll wave back at ya!
Deb, Jim and my anchorman Dave!
We did it, we did it!
We did the Edgewalk in Toronto.
